00035     AuxInfoReader::AuxInfoReader(G4GDMLParser* theParser) :
00036             parser_(theParser), eval_(new G4GDMLEvaluator) {
00037     }

00039     AuxInfoReader::~AuxInfoReader() {
00040         delete eval_;
00041         delete detectorHeader_;

00044     void AuxInfoReader::readGlobalAuxInfo() {
00045 
00046         const G4GDMLAuxListType* auxInfoList = parser_->GetAuxList();
00047         for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00048 
00049             G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00050             G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00051             G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00052 
00053             if (auxType == "SensDet") {
00054                 createSensitiveDetector(auxVal, iaux->auxList);
00055             } else if (auxType == "DetectorID") {
00056                 createDetectorID(auxVal, iaux->auxList);
00057             } else if (auxType == "MagneticField") {
00058                 createMagneticField(auxVal, iaux->auxList);
00059             } else if (auxType == "Region") {
00060                 createRegion(auxVal, iaux->auxList);
00061             } else if (auxType == "VisAttributes") {
00062                 createVisAttributes(auxVal, iaux->auxList);
00063             } else if (auxType == "DetectorVersion") {
00064                 createDetectorHeader(auxVal, iaux->auxList);
00065             }
00066         }
00067         return;
00068     }
00069 
00070     void AuxInfoReader::createSensitiveDetector(G4String theSensDetName, const G4GDMLAuxListType* auxInfoList) {
00071 
00072         std::cout << "Creating SensitiveDetector " << theSensDetName << std::endl;
00073 
00074         G4String sdType("");
00075         G4String hcName("");
00076         G4String idName("");
00077         int subdetID = -1;
00078         int layerDepth = -1;
00079         int verbose = 0;
00080         for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00081 
00082             G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00083             G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00084             G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00085 
00086             std::cout << "auxType: " << auxType << ", auxVal: " << auxVal << ", auxUnit: " << auxUnit << std::endl;
00087 
00088             if (auxType == "SensDetType") {
00089                 sdType = auxVal;
00090             } else if (auxType == "HitsCollection") {
00091                 hcName = auxVal;
00092             } else if (auxType == "Verbose") {
00093                 verbose = atoi(auxVal.c_str());
00094             } else if (auxType == "SubdetID") {
00095                 subdetID = atoi(auxVal.c_str());
00096             } else if (auxType == "DetectorID") {
00097                 idName = auxVal;
00098             } else if (auxType == "LayerDepth") {
00099                 layerDepth = atoi(auxVal.c_str());
00100             }
00101         }
00102 
00103         if (sdType == "") {
00104             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The SensDet is missing the SensDetType.");
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (hcName == "") {
00108             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The SensDet is missing the HitsCollection.");
00109         }
00110 
00111         if (subdetID <= 0) {
00112             std::cerr << "Bad SubdetID: " << subdetID << std::endl;
00113             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The SubdetID is missing or has an invalid value.");
00114         }
00115 
00116         /*
00117          * Use the default detector ID or create one from information supplied in the userinfo block, if present.
00118          */
00119         DetectorID* detID = new DefaultDetectorID();
00120         if (idName != "") {
00121             detID = DetectorIDStore::getInstance()->getID(idName);
00122             if (!detID) {
00123                 std::cerr << "The Detector ID" << idName << " does not exist.  Is it defined before the SensDet in userinfo?" << std::endl;
00124                 G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The referenced Detector ID was not found.");
00125             }
00126         }
00127         /*
00128          * Build the Sensitive Detector, and re-assign the detID if applicable
00129          */
00130         G4VSensitiveDetector* sd = 0;
00131 
00132         if (sdType == "TrackerSD") {
00133             sd = new TrackerSD(theSensDetName, hcName, subdetID, detID);
00134         } else if (sdType == "EcalSD") {
00135             detID = new EcalDetectorID();
00136             sd = new EcalSD(theSensDetName, hcName, subdetID, detID);
00137         } else if (sdType == "HcalSD") {
00138             sd = new HcalSD(theSensDetName, hcName, subdetID, detID);
00139         } else if (sdType == "CalorimeterSD") {
00140             sd = new CalorimeterSD(theSensDetName, hcName, subdetID, detID);
00141         } else if (sdType == "ScoringPlaneSD") { 
00142             sd = new ScoringPlaneSD(theSensDetName, hcName, subdetID, detID); 
00143         } else {
00144             std::cerr << "Unknown SensitiveDetector type: " << sdType << std::endl;
00145             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "Unknown SensitiveDetector type in aux info.");
00146         }
00147 
00148         /*
00149          * Fix  layer depth if the Sensitive Detector is not the Tracker
00150          */
00151         if (sdType != "TrackerSD" && layerDepth != -1) {
00152             ((CalorimeterSD*) sd)->setLayerDepth(layerDepth);
00153             std::cout << "Layer depth set to " << layerDepth << std::endl;
00154         }
00155         sd->SetVerboseLevel(verbose);
00156 
00157         std::cout << "Created " << sdType << " " << theSensDetName << " with hits collection " << hcName << " and verbose level " << verbose << std::endl << std::endl;
00158     }

00160     void AuxInfoReader::assignAuxInfoToVolumes() {
00161         const G4LogicalVolumeStore* lvs = G4LogicalVolumeStore::GetInstance();
00162         std::vector<G4LogicalVolume*>::const_iterator lvciter;
00163         for (lvciter = lvs->begin(); lvciter != lvs->end(); lvciter++) {
00164             G4GDMLAuxListType auxInfo = parser_->GetVolumeAuxiliaryInformation(*lvciter);
00165             if (auxInfo.size() > 0) {
00166 
00167                 for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfo.begin(); iaux != auxInfo.end(); iaux++) {
00168 
00169                     G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00170                     G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00171                     G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00172 
00173                     G4LogicalVolume* lv = (*lvciter);
00174 
00175                     if (auxType == "SensDet") {
00176                         G4String sdName = auxVal;
00177                         G4VSensitiveDetector* sd = G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->FindSensitiveDetector(sdName);
00178                         if (sd != NULL) {
00179                             lv->SetSensitiveDetector(sd);
00180                             std::cout << "Assigned SD " << sd->GetName() << " to " << lv->GetName() << std::endl;
00181                         } else {
00182                             std::cout << "Unknown SensDet in volume's auxiliary info: " << sdName << std::endl;
00183                             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The SensDet was not found.  Is it defined in userinfo?");
00184                         }
00185                     } else if (auxType == "MagneticField") {
00186                         G4String magFieldName = auxVal;
00187                         G4MagneticField* magField = MagneticFieldStore::getInstance()->getMagneticField(magFieldName);
00188                         if (magField != NULL) {
00189                             G4FieldManager* mgr = new G4FieldManager(magField);
00190                             lv->SetFieldManager(mgr, true /* FIXME: hard-coded to force field manager to daughters */);
00191                             std::cout << "Assigned magnetic field " << magFieldName << " to volume " << lv->GetName() << std::endl;
00192                         } else {
00193                             std::cout << "Unknown MagneticField ref in volume's auxiliary info: " << magFieldName << std::endl;
00194                             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The MagneticField was not found.  Is it defined in userinfo?");
00195                         }
00196                     } else if (auxType == "Region") {
00197                         G4String regionName = auxVal;
00198                         G4Region* region = G4RegionStore::GetInstance()->GetRegion(regionName);
00199                         if (region != NULL) {
00200                             region->AddRootLogicalVolume(lv);
00201                             std::cout << "Added volume " << lv->GetName() << " to region " << regionName << std::endl;
00202                         } else {
00203                             std::cerr << "Referenced region " << regionName << " was not found!" << std::endl;
00204                             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The region was not found.  Is it defined in userinfo?");
00205                         }
00206                     } else if (auxType == "VisAttributes") {
00207                         G4String visName = auxVal;
00208                         G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = VisAttributesStore::getInstance()->getVisAttributes(visName);
00209                         if (visAttributes != NULL) {
00210                             lv->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00211                             std::cout << "Assigned VisAttributes " << visName << " to volume " << lv->GetName() << std::endl;
00212                         } else {
00213                             std::cerr << "Referenced VisAttributes " << visName << " was not found!" << std::endl;
00214                             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The VisAttributes was not found.  Is it defined in userinfo?");
00215                         }
00216                     }
00217                 }
00218             }
00219         }
00220     }

00222     void AuxInfoReader::createDetectorID(G4String idName, const G4GDMLAuxListType* auxInfoList) {
00223 
00224         std::cout << "Creating DetectorID " << idName << std::endl;
00225         IDField::IDFieldList* fieldList = new IDField::IDFieldList();
00226 
00227         // iterate fields
00228         int fieldIndex = 0;
00229         for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator fieldIt = auxInfoList->begin(); fieldIt != auxInfoList->end(); fieldIt++) {
00230 
00231             std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>* fieldsAux = fieldIt->auxList;
00232 
00233             G4String auxType = fieldIt->type;
00234             G4String auxVal = fieldIt->value;
00235 
00236             if (auxType == "IDField") {
00237 
00238                 string fieldName = auxVal;
00239 
00240                 std::cout << "Creating IDField " << fieldName << std::endl;
00241 
00242                 int startBit, endBit = -1;
00243 
00244                 // iterate field aux values
00245                 for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator fieldValsIt = fieldsAux->begin(); fieldValsIt != fieldsAux->end(); fieldValsIt++) {
00246 
00247                     G4String fieldValAuxType = fieldValsIt->type;
00248                     G4String fieldValAuxValue = fieldValsIt->value;
00249 
00250                     if (fieldValAuxType == "StartBit") {
00251                         startBit = atoi(fieldValAuxValue.c_str());
00252                     } else if (fieldValAuxType == "EndBit") {
00253                         endBit = atoi(fieldValAuxValue.c_str());
00254                     }
00255                 }
00256 
00257                 if (startBit == -1) {
00258                     G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The DetectorID is missing the StartBit.");
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 if (endBit == -1) {
00262                     G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "The DetectorID is missing the EndBit.");
00263                 }
00264 
00265                 fieldList->push_back(new IDField(fieldName, fieldIndex, startBit, endBit));
00266 
00267                 std::cout << "Added IDField " << fieldName << " with StartBit = " << startBit << ", EndBit = " << endBit << ", Index = " << fieldIndex << std::endl;
00268 
00269                 // Increment field index which is assigned automatically based on element ordering.
00270                 fieldIndex++;
00271             }
00272         }
00273 
00274         DetectorID* id = new DetectorID(fieldList);
00275         DetectorIDStore::getInstance()->addID(idName, id);
00276         std::cout << "Created detector ID " << idName << std::endl << std::endl;
00277     }

00279     void AuxInfoReader::createMagneticField(G4String magFieldName, const G4GDMLAuxListType* auxInfoList) {
00280 
00281         // Find type of the mag field.
00282         G4String magFieldType("");
00283         for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00284 
00285             G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00286             G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00287 
00288             if (auxType == "MagneticFieldType") {
00289                 magFieldType = auxVal;
00290                 break;
00291             }
00292         }
00293 
00294         if (magFieldType == "") {
00295             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "Missing MagFieldType for magnetic field definition.");
00296         }
00297 
00298         G4MagneticField* magField = NULL;
00299 
00300         // Create a uniform mag field using the built-in Geant4 type.
00301         if (magFieldType == "G4UniformMagField") {
00302             string::size_type sz;
00303             double bx, by, bz;
00304             bx = by = bz = 0.;
00305             for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00306 
00307                 G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00308                 G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00309                 G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00310 
00311                 G4String expr = auxVal + "*" + auxUnit;
00312                 if (auxType == "bx") {
00313                     bx = eval_->Evaluate(expr);
00314                 } else if (auxType == "by") {
00315                     by = eval_->Evaluate(expr);
00316                 } else if (auxType == "bz") {
00317                     bz = eval_->Evaluate(expr);
00318                 }
00319             }
00320             G4ThreeVector fieldComponents(bx, by, bz);
00321             magField = new G4UniformMagField(fieldComponents);
00322 
00323             std::cout << "Created G4UniformMagField " << magFieldName << " with field components " << fieldComponents << std::endl << std::endl;
00324 
00325             // Create a global 3D field map by reading from a data file.
00326         } else if (magFieldType == "MagneticFieldMap3D") {
00327 
00328             string fileName;
00329             double offsetX, offsetY, offsetZ;
00330 
00331             for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00332 
00333                 G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00334                 G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00335                 G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00336 
00337                 G4String expr = auxVal + "*" + auxUnit;
00338 
00339                 if (auxType == "File") {
00340                     fileName = auxVal;
00341                 } else if (auxType == "OffsetX") {
00342                     offsetX = eval_->Evaluate(expr);
00343                 } else if (auxType == "OffsetY") {
00344                     offsetY = eval_->Evaluate(expr);
00345                 } else if (auxType == "OffsetZ") {
00346                     offsetZ = eval_->Evaluate(expr);
00347                 }
00348             }
00349 
00350             if (fileName.size() == 0) {
00351                 G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "File info with field data was not provided.");
00352             }
00353 
00354             // Create new 3D field map.
00355             G4MagneticField* fieldMap = new MagneticFieldMap3D(fileName.c_str(), offsetX, offsetY, offsetZ);
00356 
00357             // Assign field map as global field.
00358             G4FieldManager* fieldMgr = G4TransportationManager::GetTransportationManager()->GetFieldManager();
00359             if (fieldMgr->GetDetectorField() != nullptr) {
00360                 G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "Global mag field was already assigned.");
00361             }
00362             fieldMgr->SetDetectorField(fieldMap);
00363             fieldMgr->CreateChordFinder(fieldMap);
00364 
00365         } else {
00366             std::cerr << "Unknown MagFieldType in auxiliary info: " << magFieldType << std::endl;
00367             G4Exception("", "", FatalException, "Unknown MagFieldType in auxiliary info.");
00368         }
00369 
00370         MagneticFieldStore::getInstance()->addMagneticField(magFieldName, magField);
00371     }

00373     void AuxInfoReader::createRegion(G4String name, const G4GDMLAuxListType* auxInfoList) {
00374 
00375         bool storeTrajectories = true;
00376         for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00377 
00378             G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00379             G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00380             G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00381 
00382             if (auxType == "StoreTrajectories") {
00383                 if (auxVal == "false") {
00384                     storeTrajectories = false;
00385                 } else if (auxVal == "true") {
00386                     storeTrajectories = true;
00387                 }
00388             }
00389         }
00390 
00391         G4VUserRegionInformation* regionInfo = new UserRegionInformation(storeTrajectories);
00392         G4Region* region = new G4Region(name);
00393         region->SetUserInformation(regionInfo);
00394 
00395         std::cout << "Created new detector region " << region->GetName() << std::endl << std::endl;
00396     }

00398     void AuxInfoReader::createVisAttributes(G4String name, const G4GDMLAuxListType* auxInfoList) {
00399 
00400         G4double rgba[4] = {1., 1., 1., 1.};
00401         G4bool visible = true;
00402         G4bool dauInvisible = false;
00403         G4bool forceWireframe = false;
00404         G4bool forceSolid = false;
00405         G4double lineWidth = 1.0;
00406         G4VisAttributes::LineStyle lineStyle = G4VisAttributes::unbroken;
00407 
00408         for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00409 
00410             G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00411             G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00412             G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00413 
00414             if (auxType == "R") {
00415                 rgba[0] = atof(auxVal.c_str());
00416             } else if (auxType == "G") {
00417                 rgba[1] = atof(auxVal.c_str());
00418             } else if (auxType == "B") {
00419                 rgba[2] = atof(auxVal.c_str());
00420             } else if (auxType == "A") {
00421                 rgba[3] = atof(auxVal.c_str());
00422             } else if (auxType == "Style") {
00423                 if (auxVal == "wireframe") {
00424                     forceWireframe = true;
00425                 } else if (auxVal == "solid") {
00426                     forceSolid = true;
00427                 }
00428             } else if (auxType == "DaughtersInvisible") {
00429                 if (auxVal == "true") {
00430                     dauInvisible = true;
00431                 } else if (auxVal == "false") {
00432                     dauInvisible = false;
00433                 }
00434             } else if (auxType == "Visible") {
00435                 if (auxVal == "true") {
00436                     visible = true;
00437                 } else if (auxVal == "false") {
00438                     visible = false;
00439                 }
00440             } else if (auxType == "LineStyle") {
00441                 if (auxVal == "unbroken") {
00442                     lineStyle = G4VisAttributes::unbroken;
00443                 } else if (auxVal == "dashed") {
00444                     lineStyle = G4VisAttributes::dashed;
00445                 } else if (auxVal == "dotted") {
00446                     lineStyle = G4VisAttributes::dotted;
00447                 }
00448             } else if (auxType == "LineWidth") {
00449                 lineWidth = atof(auxVal.c_str());
00450             }
00451         }
00452 
00453         G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = new G4VisAttributes();
00454         visAttributes->SetColor(rgba[0], rgba[1], rgba[2], rgba[3]);
00455         visAttributes->SetVisibility(visible);
00456         visAttributes->SetDaughtersInvisible(dauInvisible);
00457         visAttributes->SetForceWireframe(forceWireframe);
00458         visAttributes->SetForceSolid(forceSolid);
00459         visAttributes->SetLineWidth(lineWidth);
00460         visAttributes->SetLineStyle(lineStyle);
00461         VisAttributesStore::getInstance()->addVisAttributes(name, visAttributes);
00462 
00463         std::cout << "Created VisAttributes " << name << std::endl << (*visAttributes) << std::endl << std::endl;
00464     }

00466     void AuxInfoReader::createDetectorHeader(G4String auxValue, const G4GDMLAuxListType* auxInfoList) {
00467 
00468         int detectorVersion = atoi(auxValue.c_str());
00469 
00470         std::string detectorName("");
00471         std::string author("");
00472         std::string description("");
00473 
00474         for (std::vector<G4GDMLAuxStructType>::const_iterator iaux = auxInfoList->begin(); iaux != auxInfoList->end(); iaux++) {
00475 
00476             G4String auxType = iaux->type;
00477             G4String auxVal = iaux->value;
00478             G4String auxUnit = iaux->unit;
00479 
00480             if (auxType == "DetectorName") {
00481                 detectorName = auxVal;
00482             } else if (auxType == "Author") {
00483                 author = auxVal;
00484             } else if (auxType == "Description") {
00485                 description = auxVal;
00486             }
00487         }
00488 
00489         detectorHeader_ = new DetectorHeader(detectorName, detectorVersion, description, author);
00490 
00491         std::cout << std::endl;
00492         std::cout << "Read detector header from userinfo: " << std::endl;
00493         std::cout << "  DetectorName: " << detectorHeader_->getName() << std::endl;
00494         std::cout << "  DetectorVersion: " << detectorHeader_->getVersion() << std::endl;
00495         std::cout << "  Author: " << detectorHeader_->getAuthor() << std::endl;
00496         std::cout << "  Description: " << detectorHeader_->getDescription() << std::endl;
00497         std::cout << std::endl;
00498 
00499     }
